Title: Sylius Admin Bundle Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability
Description:
Sylius 1.0.0 to 1.0.16, 1.1.0 to 1.1.8, 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 versions of AdminBundle and ResourceBundle are affected by this security issue.

This issue has been fixed in Sylius 1.0.17, 1.1.9 and 1.2.2. Development branch for 1.3 release has also been fixed.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.0.0 before 1.0.17, all versions starting from 1.1.0 before 1.1.9, all versions starting from 1.2.0 before 1.2.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.0.0, all versions starting from 1.0.17 before 1.1.0, all versions starting from 1.1.9 before 1.2.0, all versions starting from 1.2.2
